thread.section_title: SmartBuyGlasses Canada Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of SmartBuyGlasses Canada | smartbuyglasses.ca
thread.title: Barry

author: Barry
title: Barry
text: have now ordered 3 sets of glasses (1 sunglasses, 2 regular). Prescription done right, comes very fast. Had one warranty issue with broken frame that they tried to get me to fix locally (no luck there) and then couldn't replace my frame, but eventually (after numerous back and forths with numerous different agents) discovered that they could get me the same frames, but only in a different color cant believe I had to suggest that before anybody twigged on it!
